dialogue.text: the week happens but there are a couple extra days we have a good time AMI is the best but now ive gotta job to do
So...yeah. I’m back.
{i}Yeah. I can see that. And here I was beginning to think I’d have to bury your niece.{/i}
I don’t think that will be necessary. She did a great job, all things considered.
{i}“All things” meaning the fact that you’re so devoted to suffering in silence that you’d completely disregard me {b}again?{/i}

{i}I could have helped too, you know. Granted, I still have no clue what even fucking happened. But it’d be nice if you told Ami to maybe make an exception for me the {b}next{/b} time you have a mental breakdown.{/i}
Sorry. I’ll be sure to anticipate the sudden striking of tragedy a little better in the future so as to not inconvenience you any further.
Good. So how are you feeling {i}now?{/i}
Do you want to talk about it?
{i}What do you think?{/i}
That I really hope I’m not going to have to take you on another tour down memory lane since my feet still kind of hurt from the last one.
{i}I don’t think that’ll be necessary, Niki.{/i}
Is Ami with you right now?
{i}Yeah. We’re on our way to school.{/i}
You’re going back to work already? Are you a fucking lunatic? You’ve been in what was effectively a coma for two months. Take some more time off.
{i}I’m not working today. I just want to explain what happened to everyone and...let them know I’m not dead.{/i}
Does Noriko know yet?
{i}No. You’re the first person I’ve called.{/i}
Are you just saying that to make me happy?
{i}I’m really not. I just got my phone back a couple minutes ago.{/i}
That makes it sound like you were grounded.
{i}Well...{/i}
Hey, remember that one time you actually {i}were{/i} grounded? And I helped you climb out of your window so we could hang out and, like...what did we do again? Throw rocks at stuff?
{i}I wish I knew.{/i}
Oh, right. {i}Amnesia.{/i}
{i}Something like that.{/i}
Hey, Akira...
{i}What’s up?{/i}
I love you.
Embarrassed to say it back in front of Ami?
{i}It’d be safer for both of us if I don’t.{/i}
Booooooooring.
{i}Yeah. So, what are your plans for the rest of the day?{/i}
Work. I’ve got a commercial for some mobile game later. Then dance lessons after that. Then, I’m meeting up with Otoha for a quick lesson since we didn’t get to have any over winter break.
{i}Did you hear that she and Rin broke up?{/i}
I don’t see how that has any relevance to me whatsoever. And unlike you, I know better than to get myself involved in my pupils’ love affairs.
{i}Harsh. {/i}
How about you? What’s on the docket after you inform your class that you’ve become a zombie?
{i}Probably sitting in a dark corner and hating myself until the sun comes up tomorrow.{/i}
Want me to cancel Otoha’s lesson and come fuck the gloom out of you?
{i}You’re on speaker, you know.{/i}
Hi, Ami. Your uncle’s got a fat cock.
{i}Wow. Okay. Remind me to never actually put you on speakerphone.{/i}
I can tell when you’re lying to me, asshole. But that’s why I’m so worried after hearing that “sitting in a dark corner” shit. Take it easy, would you?
{i}I’m trying. That’s where the dark corner comes into play. But I should probably hang up now. Ami’s starting to give me the death stare.{/i}
Okay.
I’m glad you’re feeling better. Even if “better” isn’t actually {i}better{/i} and you’re just kind of...conscious again.
I missed you. And for the zillionth time even though I know you won’t listen, you can always talk to me if you need anything.
{i}I think I might actually do that soon. {/i}
I’ll believe it when I see it. Love you, baby. Have fun at school.
{i}Have fun being famous.{/i}
I always do.
Baka.
That was way longer than a minute...
Yeah, I figured I owed her a little more since she used to have the same job as you.
Huh? When did {i}you{/i} find out Niki was the number one maid? That’s supposed to be a secret known only to the girls of the cafe. It’s part of our initiation.
I meant caretaker. Also, what? The number one maid has been her this entire time?
It was just once for a promo thing a long time ago and-
Wait...stop talking to me so casually. It’s giving me less time to talk you out of this insanely stupid and dangerous decision you’re making right now.
We can still turn around. We haven’t made it to the gates yet.
I’m not turning around, Ami.
Well...what if I just...tell everyone you’re okay now?! That should work, right? Here. Let’s take a selfie I can show them as evidence.
You know what would be better than that? Me actually showing myself in person. {i}Then{/i} I can go back into hiding until the weight of the world lets up a little.
But what if one of the girls is really mad that you were gone for so long and then rapes and dismembers you as revenge?
In that order?
The order doesn’t matter! The point is you’ll still be getting hurt and I can’t let that happen! I won’t let that happen! I’m supposed to protect you! I’m supposed to-
Ami.
What?!?!?!
Please shut the fuck up.
Sensei!
I made a decision. And you can either stand by and support me, or you can put me in a box where I’ll never have any free will or conscious thought for the rest of my life.
Ooh, I like the box option. Let’s do that. I can even put a little succulent in there with you so you can have some enrichment.
Please...just be a good girl.
Oh, you don’t have to worry about that. I promise to be as good as I can possibly be.

But, just so you know, some of the girls might be reeeeeeeeeaaaaally mad that I kept you all to myself for so long! So you need to be ready to deal with that and explain to them that I was right the whole time!
Yeah. I’m expecting as much. But, if all goes according to plan, we won’t be here all that long to begin with.
Oh, Sensei...
Things {i}never{/i} go according to plan.
When Ami and I make it to school, I manage to sever the stitches she sewed onto my hip and convince her to go wait for me in class.
And while I also asked her to inform everyone that I’ll actually be {i}here{/i} today so as to not shock them half to death, I doubt she’ll listen.
In fact, she hasn’t listened to much of {i}anything{/i} this last week as she’s still convinced I’m not fit to decide anything for myself.
And maybe she’s right.
Maybe I should just listen to her and take on a new role as her puppet instead of her uncle. I’m sure the hours would be better.
But I’m also sure that {i}both{/i} of those roles have the same exact, colossal problem.
Ami.
I think I’m breaking her.
...and if we divide the hours like this instead, both of our classes should have adequate time to use the gymnasium as training for sports day.
Training? We’ve gotta train for that shit? Just take the damn W, Wakana. My girls are way too down in the dumps to be focusing on athletics right now.
I used to love sports day when I was in high school. But I had this weird problem where I always wound up making out with somebody on one of the opposing teams.
That’s wonderful, Rika. Now, as I was saying-
Maybe I have a thing for villains? Do you guys look at the opposing team as-

Jeeeesus Christ! When did {i}you{/i} get there? You nearly gave me a heart attack. I’m old, you know. You have to be careful around me. I’m fragile. Also, {i}why{/i} did you get there? What’s happening? Hello.
Rika, pay attention.
This applies to you even {i}if{/i} you’re not actually a teacher. I’m going to need your help setting up the cones for-
Wakana...look...
Why? Surely you have a hall pass if you’re going to interrupt-
Ara...kawa...
Hey...
Long time, no see.
Hold this.
Huh? What?
{i}Psst...I think you should run.{/i}
Wakana-
Hey! I said {i}I{/i} was gonna do that!
You bastard! Do you have {i}any{/i} idea how worried we’ve been?! How hard Imani has had to work because of {i}your{/i} absence?! Do you?!
I thought we weren’t allowed to hit people in school?
I didn’t mean to-
I don’t give a flying fuck, Arakawa! You have a responsibility as a {i}teacher{/i} to not pull shit like this!
When you don’t show up for work, the rest of {i}us{/i} have to suffer! Do you understand that?!
I...yeah. I get it.
Bullshit! You’ve never understood a single {i}thing{/i} about this job! And now you’re going to pretend you {i}do{/i} just because you’re being yelled at?! How weak are you?!
Wakana, take it easy! People are going to start showing up soon! You’re causing a scene!
Look at me you, piece of shit! Fucking look at me, Arakawa!
I {i}am{/i} looking at you. What else do you want from me?
Fuck you! Fuck you, fuck you, fuck you!
Fuck you, fuck you, fuck you, fuck you, fuck you, fuck you, fuck you, fuck you!!!!
Woah.
You absolute dick! You complete imbecile! You petulant child! Where do you get off?!
Since when does Wakana have feelings? I thought {i}I{/i} was the feelings teacher.
You’re not even a teacher, Rika.
Oh, right.
Hey, wait a minute! That’s the guy {i}you{/i} want to hug! And I don’t know you two well enough to choose sides yet!
Yeah...even I’m a little surprised by this sudden development and Wakana’s the best girlfriend I’ve ever had.
What? You two are dating? Does Osako know?
Rika, stop talking.
Hey! No hugging in the hall! You’re making the rest of us jealous!
Arakawa, you fucking asshole!
Two months?! Really?! Without even calling?! In what twisted world of yours is that okay?! How would you feel if {i}we{/i} disappeared for that long?!
I-
Don’t answer that! Your extended vacation is proof enough that you don’t care at all! But I...{i}we{/i} do! We care about you, Arakawa! Running away won’t fix anything!
I...didn’t mean to-
Fuck it. I’m going in.
Going in? What do you mean you’re {i}going in?{/i}
If I don’t make it back, tell my daughter I love her. She’s the one who looks extra lesbian now.
Bitch, I know who yo’ god damn daughter is.
Yeaaaah! Family reunion! I’m adopting all of you!
Get...off of me! I’m scolding Arakawa right now!
Well stop because that’s my job as his new mom!
Rika! Let...go! You’re heavy!
That’s no way to talk to your mother!
A little help, Imani?
Help?...
{i}Now{/i} you want help?
Wakana’s not the only one who’s shed tears over this, dude.
I’m not crying! I’m just really, really mad!
Yeah, well so am I. And if Wakana hadn’t already risked giving you brain damage, I’d be smacking you right now too.
I’m sorry, okay?
To all three of you. That’s why I’m here. Now, could you please let go of me so I can explain?
Wait, so you’re sad and you can’t even explain {i}why{/i} you’re sad?
I know exactly why I’m “sad.” It’s just kind of hard to talk about it without wanting to rip my veins out and strangle myself with them.
It’s still that bad?
I mean...I can get out of bed now. That’s good, right?
Not if you’re still feeling like shit, Senpai. I’m sure the last thing any of {i}us{/i} want is to have to unwrap your arterial noose.
Arteries and veins are different, Imani. Arakawa said nothing about arteries.
Yeah- I’m aware, Wakana. But {i}veinal{/i} doesn’t sound very good, so excuse me for bending his words a little.
If you’re feeling that terrible, you shouldn’t have come here. You could have just called.
I figured I owed it to you and all of the girls to at least show my face after all this time.
Plus, if I’m ever going to stop feeling like I’m drowning in a sea of shit, I’m probably going to have to leave the house. Maybe. Or maybe not, I don’t really know. I’m very, very bad at this.
I can tell. I haven’t ever seen you, like...{i}desperate{/i} before. You look...actually broken right now.
Yeah. Well, that’s probably because that’s exactly how I feel.

And there’s no sense in hiding it anymore because I’m pretty sure the part of my brain that allowed me to do that has gone rotten and won’t do its fucking job for more than five seconds at a time now.
Maybe that’s a good thing? I can’t guarantee that any of us can help, but we’ve all gone through tough shit before too. And we’ve got six perfectly good shoulders to cry on.
Four. Arakawa will hurt my back and his tears will ruin my clothes. He can cry on you two instead.
Thanks, Wakana.
Fuck you. I’m going to class.
Wakana, you forgot your clipboard.
Keep it. Study it. Do whatever you want. I have work to do.
So, what? You’re just going to show your face in class and then go home? Do you want me to walk with you? It’s not like I have anything going on literally ever.
Is that okay, Imani?
Do you even need to ask? Of course it’s okay. I’ll hold down the fort until you’re ready to come back for real. And until then, if there’s anything else you need, {i}please{/i} tell me.
You know, it’s kind of crazy just how many people have said that to me.
It’s not crazy at all. It just means a lot of people love you.

I get that. But what I meant was more along the lines of, “I have so many options of people to talk to, yet I can’t figure out how to talk to {i}any{/i} of them.” And that idea is pretty crazy, don’t you think?
Like...I’m hanging off a cliff and looking up at a ton of beautiful girls who want to pull me up, but I’m worried that taking their hand will just send both of us falling instead.
Not me. I have excellent grip strength.
Yeah, grab Rika’s hand. Mine sweat when I get anxious and I don’t like heights very much.
Either way, thanks. I don’t know. My head’s still not on right. And I have no clue when it will be, so it’s probably best to just avoid me for a little while.
Or forever. That works too.
Are you saying you don’t want to be friends anymore?
I’m saying I was never a good friend in the first place. And considering I’m just a shittier version of my old shitty self now, there’s nothing to get out of maintaining a relationship with me.
Do you want to be friends or not? Just give it to us straight. We’re all adults here.
I do.
Of course I do.
Imani-
If you tell me I’m like a sister to you I swear to fucking god that I will break your nose.
That’s not what I was going to say. But, I have a hard time describing the way I feel about you anyway, so I’ll just say you’re extremely important to me and leave it at that.
And Rika...I’m sorry if I gave you the wrong idea about our relationship before. I’m a douchebag and I didn’t mean it.

Apology accepted. But...and sorry if I’m completely mistaken in saying this...I was told you were the type who never really apologizes about {i}anything.{/i} Or...never wants to change and...stuff like that.
Right now, though...that’s not the way you seem at all. Right now, it’s like you’re actually {i}trying{/i} to be a better person. So, like...isn’t that a good thing?
Why are you being so down on yourself when you’re trying so hard?
Because I don’t think that’s what’s happening here.
Well...what do you think it is, then?
I think I’m a cornered animal.
And I’m just saying what I think will keep me out of harm’s way.
{i}Wakana’s affection has increased by 10!{/i}
{i}Imani’s affection has increased by 10!{/i}
{i}Rika’s affection has increased by 10!{/i}
